articles.title: Starting on the right foot: Sounders top Rapids in opener - Sounder at Heart
articles.description: Sounders win 2-0 over Rapids on a rainy night at Lumen Field.

articles.title: BYU’s supporting cast took a big step forward in upset of No. 6 Iowa State - Deseret News
articles.description: Don’t let AJ Dybantsa’s dominance distract you from the more unheralded heroes who proved crucial in securing BYU’s much-needed signature victory.

articles.title: In a Gladiator Coliseum, Milan Cortina Closes the Olympics Better Than Ever Before - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Ancient themes and a stunning setting brought the curtain down on a Winter Games that showcased some of the oldest myths in the sporting world.

articles.title: Lakers hit new low in blowout loss to Celtics - Silver Screen and Roll
articles.description: A big fourth quarter by the Celtics led to a blowout win over the Lakers on Sunday.

articles.description: There was much to discuss after Tyler Reddick and team co-owner Michael Jordan won a second consecutive race to start the 2026 NASCAR Cup Series season.

articles.title: Reporters' notebook: The Olympics closing ceremony is way more fun than you'd think - NPR
articles.description: Olympics opening ceremonies tend to get more love than their closing counterparts. But a pair of NPR reporters who watched both in Italy left with a newfound appreciation for the latter.

articles.title: McIlroy finishes one shot behind Genesis winner Bridgeman - BBC
articles.description: Rory McIlroy shoots a four-under-par 67 but it is not enough to overhaul winner Jacob Bridgeman, who wins by one shot at the Genesis Invitational in Los Angeles.

articles.title: Tyrese Haliburton diagnosed with shingles, away from Pacers - ESPN
articles.description: Pacers point guard Tyrese Haliburton was diagnosed with shingles and will be away from the team for a few weeks, coach Rick Carlisle said Sunday.

articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur 1-4 Arsenal: Eze, Gyokeres ooze class in North London derby rout - NBC Sports
articles.description: Eberechi Eze and Viktor Gyokeres bagged braces to relaunch Arsenal's title hopes with a 4-1 win over rivals Spurs in a North London derby at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Sunday.

articles.title: Team USA basks in Olympics record-shattering glory of gold - MS NOW
articles.description: The United States is bringing home a dozen gold medals as of Sunday, finishing second overall in the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympics.

articles.title: The push-off hurt, but Kentucky’s mistakes hurt more - On3
articles.description: Kentucky fans will debate the whistle, but the second-half collapse, turnovers, and missed chances cost the Wildcats the game at Auburn.

articles.title: Bruce Thornton's 32-Point Effort Not Enough for Shorthanded Buckeyes in 66-60 Loss to No. 15 Michigan State - Eleven Warriors
articles.description: A 32-point effort from Bruce Thornton wasn't enough without the services of John Mobley Jr. or Devin Royal as Ohio State fell 66-60 at No. 15 Michigan State.

articles.title: Final 2026 Winter Olympics medal count, standings - The Big Lead
articles.description: The 2026 Winter Olympics medal count standings have been finalized, with the Closing Ceremony underway at the historic Arena di Verona for the Milan Cortina Games. In the final competition of the day, Team USA picked up its 12th gold medal, which is the count…
